citation.article-title: Description of Idiomarina insulisalsae sp. nov., isolated from the soil of a sea salt evaporation pond, proposal to transfer the species of the genus Pseudidiomarina to the genus Idiomarina and emended description of the genus Idiomarina

p.s: Description of Idiomarina sediminum comb. nov.
Pseudidiomarina sediminum (se.di.mi’num. L. gen. pl. n. sediminum of sediments, pertaining to the source of isolation of the type strain).
Basonym: Pseudidiomarina sediminum Hu and Li [7].
The description is identical to that given for Pseudidiomarina sediminum by Hu and Li [7].
The type strain, c121T (=CICC 10319T=LMG 24046T) was isolated from coastal sediment of Luoyuan Bay, Fujian province, PR China.
